ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bow for bards!
ygData.msgSnippet: OK I m just got Kunark after taking a 3 month break from EQ.  I ve been avoiding all the Kunark related posts so this one has me confused.  Do we now get to
ygData.messageBody:
OK I'm just got Kunark after taking a 3 month break from EQ. I've been
avoiding all the Kunark related posts so this one has me confused. Do we
now get to train Bow skill? If not, whats the purpose of this bow? The
charisma and magic save is nice, but I think the runed bone fork is still
better.

Galtin

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Monday, May 08, 2000 4:40 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bow for bards!


Heh, thanks.

Sionachie's Partisan
Magic Lore
Skill: Piercing Atk Delay: 19
Damage: 9
Cha +6, Int +2, sv Magic +5
Wt. 1.8
Bard / All

http://www.gameznet.com/eq/equipment/sionachiespartisan.html

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/me/sionachie1.jpg

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/me/sionachie2.jpg

It looks simply wicked! It does good damage too. Used it on some raptors
(dinos not birds?? only Vernat...) in Timourous Deep.

Sylly

p.s. still looking for all all arrows to give my bow a try. spent most of
the weekend playing my ranger guy 6, cleric 11, & wiz 31 (you can exp twink
with a wizard but it aint easy! or maybe i am just a dweeb. i took the wiz
and the cleric to the wk ghoul camp. bound the wiz there. pulled single
ghouls and nuked it down to a sliver. gated to nk. then the cleric was
supposed to kill the ghoul (red). well, a sliver for 31 is not same as a
sliver for a 9. and being red it was hard to do damage even if only a
little bit was needed. and of course the ghoul would cast and weaken/root,
etc. we died a couple times. once the cleric was still bound in crushbone
zone and was trained at her bind spot. double death on that one - ugh.)
